pull.title: Strictly hash what is going to be signed
pull.body:
Continues #4694.
Again, more important than the optimization, I think the end result is more readable.
It could be a little bit nicer by joining SignHash and Sign, but then multisig's performance would be hurt.

events.message: Don't hash what you're not going to sign
Refactor SignSignature and higher level Solver
Strictly hash what is going to be signed (without hurting multisig)

events.body:

Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
I think I've changed my mind, at least on removing SignN. Closing for now.
